ModMetaData.name: [Fuu] Auto Strip on Haul
ModMetaData.author: Fuu Chan
ModMetaData.description:
Your pawns will automatically strip corpses of their weapons, useable equipment (ie: belts, grenades, utility), and smeltable apparel (ie: metallic helmets, armor) upon hauling them.
Ideal for scavenger or cannibal colonies that don't want to manually assign strip orders after every battle!
The amount of tainted non-smeltable apparel (ie: tainted cloth/leather t-shirts, hats, pants) stripped can be optionally configured as well. For those who would rather not deal with tons of useless tainted clothes after every battle!
*Optimized for performance. *Safe to add and remove mid-game. *Rocketman compatible. *CE compatible. *No conflicts since this is an independent feature addition.
Credits to: TororoRose, avogado6, and Gawr Gura for the artwork used in the thumbnail! Give them a visit!
